title: RSyntax

metadata.description: Learn about RSyntax with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Syntax
To output text in R, use single or double quotes:
Example
"Hello World!"

To output numbers, just type the number (without quotes):
Example
5
10
25

To do simple calculations, add numbers together:
Example
5 + 5

Congratulations! You have now written your first R code.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers RSyntax concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use RSyntax effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of RSyntax and how to apply it in your projects.
